### Input format 

#### Single Nucleotide Variants:

Input file should conform to maf files format, with the following list of fields:

> Tumor_Sample_Barcode, Hugo_Symbol, Chromosome, Start_Position, End_Position, Reference_Allele, Tumor_Seq_Allele2, Variant_Classification, Variant_Type
